ABOUT ME

Hi I'm James. Nice To Meet You

My name is James Kaewanan. I have been studying Computer Science for 7+ Years and within that time have gained valuable experiences and knowledge regarding this field. Although Programming has been a huge part of my academic and personal life, I also have many hobbies and interests which I have realized into creative projects. This website is a brief portfolio to showcase my experiences and projects.
